sentences.en: Brian had learned to look at her with new respect.
sentences.cn: 布赖恩看她时变得多了一分尊重。

sentences.en: He had asked around and learned that Billy was not yet here.
sentences.cn: 他四处询问，得知比利还没到这儿。

sentences.en: He learned this lesson the hard way from his own personal experience.
sentences.cn: 吃一堑长一智，他这个教训来之不易——是从他自己的亲身经历中得来的。

sentences.en: I am convinced that he has learned from his mistakes.
sentences.cn: 我深信他已从错误中吸取了教训。

sentences.en: I learned a lot from him about how to run a band.
sentences.cn: 我从他那里学到了许多关于经营乐队方面的东西.

sentences.en: I learned how to weigh out packages of seed.
sentences.cn: 我学会了如何称出袋装种子的重量。

sentences.en: I nearly died when I learned where I was ending up.
sentences.cn: 得知自己到了哪里时，我简直要晕过去了。

sentences.en: Jane was just 25 when she learned she had cancer.
sentences.cn: 简得知自己罹癌那一年才25岁。

sentences.en: She learned her insurance had been canceled by Pacific Mutual Insurance Company.
sentences.cn: 她得知自己的保险已经被太平洋互助保险公司中止了。

sentences.en: She learned to draw by tracing pictures out of old storybooks.
sentences.cn: 她通过描摹旧故事书上的图画学会了画画。

sentences.en: She learned to wire and plumb the house herself.
sentences.cn: 她学会了自己给房子拉接电线、敷设水管。

sentences.en: She's kicked her drug habit and learned that her life has value.
sentences.cn: 她已经戒了毒，并且认识到了生命可贵。

sentences.en: The leader has also learned to play more melodically.
sentences.cn: 这位领导人也学会了演奏得更加优美动听。

sentences.en: They never learned skills to engage the attention of the others.
sentences.cn: 他们从未学过吸引他人注意的技巧。

sentences.en: You are merely reciting facts that you have learned by rote.
sentences.cn: 你只是在背诵自己死记硬背下来的东西。

words.tran_cn: 有学问的,博学的,聪明的
有经验的,世故的,熟练的

phrases.tran_cn: 习得性无助；学习性无力感
经验教训；教训总结；取得的教训

trans.tran_cn: 有学问的，博学的，学术性的，后天习得的
trans.tran_en: a learned person has a lot of knowledge because they have read and studied a lot
